name: converse-backend
description: Our chat application is a real-time communication platform built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with WebSocket integration. It allows users to engage in private messaging, group chats, and receive real-time notifications about typing and online statuses. The application supports authentication for secure access and ensures message delivery with read receipts (ticks). With a user-friendly interface and robust backend, our chat app provides a seamless and interactive communication experience.
author: preksha jain
